name: Octi Octopus
description:
A fast click game with beautiful underwater scenes. Really fun to play with touch screen!

Save the fish from being eaten by clicking on them to warn them before they reach Octi Octopus. Try to keep up as more and more fish appear from all directions. Just wait until Octi Octopus starts moving around!

Type of Game: Click game

Levels: 10

Difficulty Settings: 3 - Calm, Stormy and Hurricane

Time per level: Choose 3 minutes, 5 or 10 minutes per level based (These are game minutes - a little less than actual minutes.)

Game Save: No, if you turn the game off you have to restart.

Music: 2 different tracks - music can be turned off from the menu

Sound Effects: yes, sound on click and fish being eaten - can be turned off from the menu

Window / Full Screen: Toggle from the menu, is really nice to play full screen.
